Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, we start with the Service Request (SR) verification. The next mandatory task is Contract Setup (CS). So, after SR, CS must follow.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Then comes Datacenter Allocation (DA) and Access Control Initialization (ACI), which are parallel tasks. They should be part of a partial order with no dependencies between them.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: After DA and ACI are done, we enter the loop: Base Network Configuration (BNC), followed by optional Debug & Reconfigure (D&R). The loop continues until successful configuration, so I need to use an OperatorPOWL for LOOP.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Once the loop ends, theres an exclusive choice between Containerized Deployment (CD) and Monolithic Deployment (MD). This will be an XOR operator with both options as children.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: After deployment, QA and SA must happen in any order. So they should be part of a partial order without dependencies. Finally, GLA can only start after both QA and SA are done, so thats another ordering constraint.
